segments.text: What do you do when you are angry ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I usually calm down first and think about the reason that caused my anger .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That â€™ s smart . What do you usually do to relieve your anger ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Something like listening to music is a good idea .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , what kind of music do you listen to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Classic . Something that could calm your mind .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that might work for me as well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Working out is another good way to relieve anger .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Jogging , yoga , or even just taking a walk .
segments.speaker: S2
